mapper.insert:
insert into revenue_forecast(id, themeinfor_id, save_date, dept_id, annual, april_plan, april_forecast, april_actual, may_plan, may_forecast, may_actual, june_plan, june_forecast, june_actual, july_plan, july_forecast, july_actual, august_plan, august_forecast, august_actual, september_plan, september_forecast, september_actual, october_plan, october_forecast, october_actual, november_plan, november_forecast, november_actual, december_plan, december_forecast, december_actual, january_plan, january_forecast, january_actual, february_plan, february_forecast, february_actual, march_plan, march_forecast, march_actual, CREATEBY, CREATEON, MODIFYBY, MODIFYON, OWNER, STATUS, TENANTID) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.themeinforId}, #{entity.saveDate}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.annual}, #{entity.aprilPlan}, #{entity.aprilForecast}, #{entity.aprilActual}, #{entity.mayPlan}, #{entity.mayForecast}, #{entity.mayActual}, #{entity.junePlan}, #{entity.juneForecast}, #{entity.juneActual}, #{entity.julyPlan}, #{entity.julyForecast}, #{entity.julyActual}, #{entity.augustPlan}, #{entity.augustForecast}, #{entity.augustActual}, #{entity.septemberPlan}, #{entity.septemberForecast}, #{entity.septemberActual}, #{entity.octoberPlan}, #{entity.octoberForecast}, #{entity.octoberActual}, #{entity.novemberPlan}, #{entity.novemberForecast}, #{entity.novemberActual}, #{entity.decemberPlan}, #{entity.decemberForecast}, #{entity.decemberActual}, #{entity.januaryPlan}, #{entity.januaryForecast}, #{entity.januaryActual}, #{entity.februaryPlan}, #{entity.februaryForecast}, #{entity.februaryActual}, #{entity.marchPlan}, #{entity.marchForecast}, #{entity.marchActual}, #{entity.createby}, #{entity.createon}, #{entity.modifyby}, #{entity.modifyon}, #{entity.owner}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.tenantid})
on duplicate key update themeinfor_id = values(themeinfor_id), save_date = values(save_date), dept_id = values(dept_id), annual = values(annual), april_plan = values(april_plan), april_forecast = values(april_forecast), april_actual = values(april_actual), may_plan = values(may_plan), may_forecast = values(may_forecast), may_actual = values(may_actual), june_plan = values(june_plan), june_forecast = values(june_forecast), june_actual = values(june_actual), july_plan = values(july_plan), july_forecast = values(july_forecast), july_actual = values(july_actual), august_plan = values(august_plan), august_forecast = values(august_forecast), august_actual = values(august_actual), september_plan = values(september_plan), september_forecast = values(september_forecast), september_actual = values(september_actual), october_plan = values(october_plan), october_forecast = values(october_forecast), october_actual = values(october_actual), november_plan = values(november_plan), november_forecast = values(november_forecast), november_actual = values(november_actual), december_plan = values(december_plan), december_forecast = values(december_forecast), december_actual = values(december_actual), january_plan = values(january_plan), january_forecast = values(january_forecast), january_actual = values(january_actual), february_plan = values(february_plan), february_forecast = values(february_forecast), february_actual = values(february_actual), march_plan = values(march_plan), march_forecast = values(march_forecast), march_actual = values(march_actual), CREATEBY = values(CREATEBY), CREATEON = values(CREATEON), MODIFYBY = values(MODIFYBY), MODIFYON = values(MODIFYON), OWNER = values(OWNER), STATUS = values(STATUS), TENANTID = values(TENANTID)
mapper.select:
SELECT theme.THEMEINFOR_ID themeinforId, theme.THEMENAME themeName, theme.TOOLSORGS customerName, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 4),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 4),0) aprilActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 5),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 5),0) mayActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 6),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 6),0) juneActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 7),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 7),0) julyActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 8),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 8),0) augustActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 9),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 9),0) septemberActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 10),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 10),0) octoberActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 11),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 11),0) novemberActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} AND temp.month = 12),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} AND unit.month = 12),0) decemberActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} + 1 AND temp.month = 1),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} + 1 AND unit.month = 1),0) januaryActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} + 1 AND temp.month = 2),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} + 1 AND unit.month = 2),0) februaryActual, IFNULL((SELECT temp.amount FROM () as temp where temp.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND temp.year = #{year} + 1 AND temp.month = 3),0) + IFNULL((SELECT unit.amount FROM () as unit where unit.themeId = theme.THEMEINFOR_ID AND unit.year = #{year} + 1 AND unit.month = 3),0) marchActual, SUM(detail.AMOUNT4) aprilPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT5) mayPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT6) junePlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT7) julyPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT8) augustPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT9) septemberPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT10) octoberPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT11) novemberPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT12) decemberPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT1) januaryPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT2) februaryPlan, SUM(detail.AMOUNT3) marchPlan FROM themeinfor theme INNER JOIN themeplandetail detail ON theme.THEMEINFOR_ID = detail.THEMEINFOR_ID
detail.CENTER_ID = #{deptId} AND detail.YEAR = #{year} AND detail.TYPE = '0' AND detail.CONTRACTTYPE IN('PJ142001','PJ142002','PJ142003','PJ142004','PJ142005')
GROUP BY theme.THEMEINFOR_ID
mapper.sql: SELECT SUM(count.CLAIMAMOUNT) amount, conapp.THEMEINFOR_ID themeId, DATE_FORMAT(count.DELIVERYDATE, '%Y') year, DATE_FORMAT(count.DELIVERYDATE, '%c') month FROM contractapplication conapp LEFT JOIN award award ON conapp.CONTRACTNUMBER = award.CONTRACTNUMBER LEFT JOIN contractnumbercount count ON conapp.CONTRACTNUMBER = count.CONTRACTNUMBER WHERE award.STATUS = '4' AND conapp.GROUP_ID = #{deptId} AND conapp.CONTRACTTYPE not in ('HT008002', 'HT008004', 'HT008006', 'HT008008') GROUP BY conapp.THEMEINFOR_ID,DATE_FORMAT(count.DELIVERYDATE, '%Y'),DATE_FORMAT(count.DELIVERYDATE, '%c')

SELECT SUM(reunite.DISTRIAMOUNT) amount, conapp.THEMEINFOR_ID themeId, DATE_FORMAT(reunite.DELIVERYDATE, '%Y') year, DATE_FORMAT(reunite.DELIVERYDATE, '%c') month FROM contractapplication conapp LEFT JOIN award award ON conapp.CONTRACTNUMBER = award.CONTRACTNUMBER LEFT JOIN awardreunite reunite ON conapp.CONTRACTNUMBER = reunite.CONTRACTNUMBER WHERE award.STATUS = '4' AND reunite.REALDEPARTMENT = #{deptId} AND conapp.CONTRACTTYPE in ('HT008002', 'HT008004', 'HT008006', 'HT008008') GROUP BY conapp.THEMEINFOR_ID,DATE_FORMAT(reunite.DELIVERYDATE, '%Y'),DATE_FORMAT(reunite.DELIVERYDATE, '%c')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MAX(save_date), '%Y%M') save_date FROM revenue_forecast
AND DATE_FORMAT(save_date, '%Y%M') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{saveDate}, '%Y%M')
